name: Otto's Magic Blocks
summary: Teach Otto new tricks as you bound through quirky levels. Beware! The magic board is flat, so you dont want to leap lazily off the end! Go bonkers and spring towards those power-ups cuz the bad bugs are out to get you! Uncover secret levels in this Dreamland Arcade hit!
